thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Ron Jevic and Randa Beirouti
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Ron Jevic and Randa Beirouti

author: Ron Jevic and Randa Beirouti
title: Ron Jevic and Randa Beirouti
text: Nick has being managing our investment properties for may years. He is by far the most proficient, honest and personable person who we have dealt with in the industry. He has been honest in his appraisals, intuitive in helping us decide on excellent tenants, efficient and responsible in dealing with maintenance issues. Good property managers are rare and Nick is a gem. We have no hesitation in highly recommending Nick to all landlords in the inner and middle north of Melbourne.
